bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.description: The following unit tests are currently failing: GradientCheckTestsComputationGraph.testLSTMWithSubset TestVariableLengthTSCG.testVariableLengthSimple, .testOutputMasking BatchNormalizationTest.testCnnShapeBatchNormBack, .testDnnShapeBatchNormBack Crash on: GravesBidirectionalLSTMTest.testConvergence() TestDropout.testDropoutSimple, .testDropoutMultiLayer TestVariableLengthTS.testVariableLengthSimple, .testOutputMasking TestDecayPolicies.testLearningRateScheduleSingleLayer, .testLearningRateScheduleMLN WeightInitUtilTests.testRelu, .testVI, .testUniform, .testNormalize, .testXavier

comments.comment: No longer crashing. If still crashing reopen.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
